layout.singingstanza: Heaven's for earth, Earth's for man, Man's for God, and That's what I am; I'm a man for God. Yes -- sir -- ee! I'm for God and He made ME!

lyrics.stanza: Heaven's for earth, Earth's for man, Man's for God, and That's what I am; I'm a man for God. Yessiree! I'm for God and He made ME!
